# `select_spatialGrid`

Select spatial grid


## Description

Select spatial grid


## Usage

```r
select_spatialGrid(...)
```


## Arguments

Argument      |Description
------------- |----------------
`...`     |      Arguments passed on to [`get_spatialGrid`](#getspatialgrid)   list("\n", "    ", list(list(list("name")), list("name of spatial grid")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("return_grid_Obj")), list("return grid object (default = FALSE)")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("gobject")), list("giotto object")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("spat_unit")), list("spatial unit (e.g. \"cell\")")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("feat_type")), list("feature type (e.g. \"rna\", \"dna\", \"protein\")")), "\n", "    ", list(list(list("set_defaults")), list("set default spat_unit and feat_type. Change to FALSE only when")), 
    "\n", "  ")
